name: Plantagonist
description:
A game about growing a strong plant to collect the most sunlight possible. The larger you are, the more sun you collect.

Controls:

Left Click to select a flower or root.
If you have one selected then you can grow the plant towards your cursor by Left Clicking anywhere on the screen.
When nothing is selected, you can drag the map using Left Click or you can also click on the stem to create a new flower or root end, and then grow it.
Right Click to remove the current flower/root to select a new one.

Watch out. Your water is running out as you grow or collect sunlight.

Made for two jams:
https://itch.io/jam/mana-burst-i (Theme: Timed)
https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-183 (Theme: Build a creature)
